5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) commanded killing the two black ones during prayer; the scorpion and the snake

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَتْلِ الْحَيَّةِ وَالْعَقْرَبِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning killing snakes and scorpions during the Prayer
